text: Kenan Yelek (born 15 August 1975 in Giresun) is a Turkish football coach and former professional footballer who played as a centre back. ==Club career== Yelek joined Samsunspor from Altay S.K. in August 2000, and has played for the club ever since. ==International career== Yelek appeared in one match for the senior Turkey national football team, entering as a second-half substitute in a friendly against Denmark on 18 February 2004. ==References== ==External links== *Kenan Yelek at TFF * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Zeytinburnuspor footballers Category:Altay S.K. footballers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Sportspeople from Giresun Category:Association football defenders
title: Kenan Yelek
